CIRCULAR  4/2000 
 
 
SUB : INDUCTION ON CISF AT AIRPORTS 
 
 
Please refer to our circular of even number dated 18.01.2000 regarding induction 
CISF at six airports and familiarization to be imparted on 3oth & 31st Jan., 2000. 
 
Commissioner of Security (CA), had decided that incase induction procedure of CISF 
start on 01.02.2000.  The officers two are supposed to be at the respective airports till 31 Jan., 
2000 may continued to be there on 01.02.2000 to over-sea to security arrangements to guide 
the CISF. 
 
 
 (P.MOHANAN) 
OFFICER ON SPECIAL DUTY (INT.) 
 
NO.CAS-6(1)/DIV-I/AFS 
Dated : 28.01.2000
